page.title: 08Church Services, Swineshead
page.content: Church services in Swineshead are conducted by the vicar, who lives at Dean. He is assisted by the Deaconess who lives at Pertenhall. They both also serve the surrounding 5 Parishes of Dean, Shelton, Yelden, Melchbourne and Pertenhall. Some of the services in Swineshead are conducted by two other vicars. There are two church wardens at the present time. The family service comes to Swineshead once every six weeks and people from the other 5 Parishes, gather together at St. Nicholas. The young children are welcome and a rug and a box of toys are provided for them at the back of the church.
